languages.text: "Нет ничего дурного в любопытстве, праздном или нет. Знания, в том числе знания о враге — это благо".
"There is nothing wrong with curiosity, idle or not. Knowledge is always a boon, including knowledge of one's enemy."
languages.original_text: "Нет ничего дурного в любопытстве, праздном или нет. Знания, в том числе знания о враге — это благо".

traits.locale_text: "There is nothing wrong about curiosity, idle or not. Knowledge is always a boon, including the knowledge of one's enemy."
"There is nothing wrong about curiosity, idle or not. Knowledge is always a boon, including the knowledge of one's enemy."
"There is nothing wrong with curiosity, idle or not. Knowledge is always a boon, including knowledge of one's enemy."
"There is nothing wrong with curiosity, idle or not. Knowledge is always a boon, including knowledge of one's enemy."
"There is nothing wrong with curiosity, idle or not. Knowledge is always a boon, including knowledge of one's enemy."

languages.text: “无论是不是无事好奇，好奇本身都并没有错。知识始终都是恩赐，了解敌人也同样是获得知识。”
languages.original_text: "There is nothing wrong with curiosity, idle or not. Knowledge is always a boon, including knowledge of one's enemy."

traits.locale_text: “无论是不是无事好奇，好奇本身都并没有错。知识始终都是恩赐，了解敌人也同样是获得知识。”

languages.text: «La curiosidad no tiene nada de malo, repentina o no. El conocimiento es siempre útil, especialmente si es sobre el enemigo».
languages.original_text: "There is nothing wrong with curiosity, idle or not. Knowledge is always a boon, including knowledge of one's enemy."

traits.locale_text: «La curiosidad no tiene nada de malo, repentina o no. El conocimiento es siempre útil, especialmente si es sobre el enemigo».

languages.text: 「偶像であろうとなかろうと、好奇心を持つのは悪いことではない。敵に関することも含め、知識はいつだって有益なものなのだからな」
languages.original_text: "There is nothing wrong with curiosity, idle or not. Knowledge is always a boon, including knowledge of one's enemy."

traits.locale_text: 「偶像であろうとなかろうと、好奇心を持つのは悪いことではない。敵に関することも含め、知識はいつだって有益なものなのだからな」

languages.text: "Neugier ist nichts Verwerfliches. Wissen ist immer ein Segen, auch Wissen über den Feind."
languages.original_text: "There is nothing wrong with curiosity, idle or not. Knowledge is always a boon, including knowledge of one's enemy."

traits.locale_text: "Neugier ist nichts Verwerfliches. Wissen ist immer ein Segen, auch Wissen über den Feind."

languages.text: « La curiosité n'est pas un défaut. La connaissance offre toujours un avantage, y compris celle qui concerne l'ennemi. »
languages.original_text: "There is nothing wrong with curiosity, idle or not. Knowledge is always a boon, including knowledge of one's enemy."

traits.locale_text: « La curiosité n'est pas un défaut. La connaissance offre toujours un avantage, y compris celle qui concerne l'ennemi. »

languages.text: "Boş olsun olmasın, meraktan zarar gelmez. Düşmanınki de dâhil İrfan, her daim nimettir."
languages.original_text: "There is nothing wrong with curiosity, idle or not. Knowledge is always a boon, including knowledge of one's enemy."

traits.locale_text: "Boş olsun olmasın, meraktan zarar gelmez. İrfan, her daim nimettir. Düşmanının irfanı da buna dâhil."
